resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108700</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108700</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085909</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding, not searching</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden, nicht suchend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conclusion, ne recherchant pas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrar, não procurarando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione, non cercante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση, που δεν ψάχνει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El encontrar, no buscando</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">You can work smarter, not harder, by determining your searching style, learning more about what your searches return and why, and learning to look in the right place first.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie können intelligenter, nicht härter 
bearbeiten, indem Sie Ihre suchende Art feststellen und mehr erlernen 
über, was Ihre Suchrückkehr und warum und erlernend, im rechten 
Platz zuerst zu schauen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous pouvez travailler plus futé, non plus dur, 
en déterminant votre modèle de recherche, apprenant plus au sujet de
ce qui votre retour de recherches et de pourquoi, et apprenant à 
regarder dans le bon endroit d'abord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você pode trabalhar mais esperto, nao mais duro, 
determinando seu estilo procurarando, aprendendo mais sobre que seu 
retorno das buscas e porque, e aprendendo olhar primeiramente no lugar
direito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete lavorare più astuto, non più duro, 
determinando il vostro stile di ricerca, imparante più circa che cosa
il vostro ritorno di ricerche e perchè ed imparando osservare nel 
giusto posto in primo luogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να απασχοληθείτε σε εξυπνώτερο, μη 
σκληρότερος, με τον καθορισμό του ύφους έρευνάς σας, μαθαίνοντας
περισσότερων για αυτό που οι αναζητήσεις σας επιστρέφουν και 
γιατί, και μαθαίνοντας να κοιτάζει στη σωστή θέση πρώτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted puede trabajar más elegante, no más duro, 
determinando su estilo que busca, aprendiendo más sobre lo que su 
vuelta de las búsquedas y porqué, y aprendiendo mirar en el lugar 
derecho primero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
